verses.roman:
nija-śāstra dekhi' tumi vicāra kariyā
ki likhiyāche śeṣe kaha nirṇaya kariyā

synonyms: nija-śāstra—your own scripture; dekhi'-seeing; tumi—you; vicāra kariyā—deliberating; ki likhiyāche—what was written; śeṣe—at the end; kaha—say; nirṇaya kariyā—ascertaining.
translation: "Seeing your own Koran and deliberating over what is written there, what is your conclusion?"
